title.rendered: Gedalia | Energy Healer And Holistic Intuitive

content.rendered:
Gedalia – Energy Healer/Naturopath/Holistic Intuitive/Ayurveda

Welcome to my online healing space.

As an energy healer/holistic intuitive, I focus on unblocking and increasing energy flow for optimal health. This process can eliminate stress, anxiety, depression, grief, loss, improve hormonal balance, aid in weight loss and relieve pain.

By awakening your body’s healing potential and increasing energy flow you may experience feeling lighter, more focused, increased energy and a renewed sense of well being on all levels: body, mind and spirit. By enlivening the electromagnetic field ( chakras) women also feel the sacred Self within.

I offer assessments and recommendations with the sessions.

How can I help you return to vibrant health and inner peace?

  • Sign Up For My Weekly Holistic Tips Blog
  • See My Services
  • Read kind words from women I have already helped
  • Read my paperback guide: Enough Drugs! I Am a Woman and Can Heal Naturally: A practical guide to feeling your best

The Enough Drugs! guide empowers women with a wealth of holistic gems to reclaim vibrant health and inner peace.
For those seeking an alternative to a reliance on prescription drugs, or for those seeking a holistic lifestyle,
the author clearly distills the benefits of creativity, meditation, movement, Ayurveda, vibrational healing
and shows you how to get started on a path to healing and wholeness.

content.rendered:
Services

What to Expect

Each session will last 60 minutes. Two hours is needed for more in-depth Ayurvedic Lifestyle recommendations. Please fill out a client questionnaire and consult form prior to your session. (See below)

During your fully clothed healing session you may experience insights, see colors, feel tingling or warmth and have a deep feeling of peace and calm. After your sessions, you may begin to experience changes in your perspective as well as on a physical and mental level. If you follow the recommendations given, you will glean more and more results. (see testimonials page)

Following your energy session, time permitted, you may be provided with recommendations such as essential oils, herbs, meditation, diet, and gemstones.                

Office Visit

One Hour- $175

This unique session focuses on opening the flow of energy through body, mind, and spirit drawing from a wealth of energy healing techniques such as Marma ( pressure points) sound, essential oils, gemstones, shamanic, intuitive listening, and color therapy.  Gently pressing acupressure points along the front and back of the body increases vital energy flow for restoration and rejuvenation, awakening your inner healing system. This session is also anti-aging and rejuvenates the skin.

Package of Three Sessions- $475 (Valid for three months from the first session)

Remote sessions are also available by phone.

Schedule a free 20 minutes/question/strategy session

678-357-3443 

Office Visit Locations:

Tuesdays, Saturdays Revive Atlanta MD 2786 N. Decatur Rd. suite 230 Decatur, Ga.

Wednesday 12-1pm Ayurveda 101 talk at Sama Food For Balance 56 E. Andrews DriveNW suite 17 Atlanta, Ga.

Appts at Sama on Wednesday afternoon

Whole Health Home Visit for Women- balancing your inner and outer home.

First Hour- $185

No traffic, no stress, I come right to your own home!

We will begin by tuning and balancing your inner being with “Marma Therapy”. Marma points are the junction between mind/body and emotions. When gently pressed along the front and back of the body this gentle pressure will restore and rejuvenate your entire being. 

Essential oils, sound, and gemstones are used to harmonize the vibrational frequencies of your body/mind. 

Second Hour (optional)- $100

Your outer home needs to reflect the harmony and balance you need to maintain your new vibe.

You may want to know:

  • Where is the ideal spot in my home for a sacred space?
  • What are some easy yoga postures I can do at home?
  • What colors will uplift or calm me and my family?
  • What essential oils should I use at home?

You will have all the answers and inspiration you need to balance your inner and outer home!

Cash or checks are accepted. Credit Cards accepted with a 4% processing fee added.

Prior to your visit, please complete these forms and bring with you to your first appointment.

Client Questionnaire

Client Consent Form

Unique Dosha Body Type Quiz

Gedalia is available over the phone if you are not in the Atlanta area

Contact Gedalia by email or by phone 678-357-3443

content.rendered:
Gedalia is a Holistic Intuitive/ Energy Healer.

About Gedalia

For more than fifteen years, I’ve helped women uncover new pathways to health and vitality by drawing on a wealth of holistic gems: Ayurveda, meditation, breathwork, essential oils, gemstones, Marma, sound healing, nutritional advice, herbs, yoga postures, and even creativity. 

My approach is unique, individualized,  highly skilled and intuitive. Rather than medicate or over supplement, I aim to unblock and reenergize the flow of energy in the body to clear the pathways for optimal health.

My energy sessions serve as a diagnostic and assessment space for your recommendations that follow as well as a deep and restorative experience for the client. Even those who have faced lifelong emotional pain or suffering leave her sessions feeling renewed.

If you want to feel like “you” again I’d love to help you!

Gedalia’s book ” Enough Drugs I am a Woman and Can Heal Naturally– a practical guide to feeling your best”- offers a clear-eyed picture of holistic tools that empower women to take back their health on all levels; body, mind, and spirit.

Gedalia holds a Ph.D. in Traditional Naturopathy, a four-year certificate in hands-on healing from Mount Soma in Asheville as well as a Marma Certificate from New Mexico and Reiki Master certification. She also traveled to India with Vasant Lad for a clinical Ayurvedic program.

Experience

• Centre Spring MD.- Worked with nationally known Integrative doctor Dr. Taz as Ayurvedic Health Specialist, Mind-Body Healer Brookhaven, Georgia. 2010-8/2018
• Created and taught a holistic approach to Grief and Loss class for CE credits. 2015-2017
• Conducted monthly classes on various holistic topics such as seasonal nutrition, essential oils, Ayurveda, chakras, and Marma.
• Keynote speaker at Sound Healing conference-2015
• Conducted programs for college students using aromatherapy to improve learning. Oglethorpe College 2014
• Guest appearance on the Weather Channel to discuss natural remedies for fall allergies, 2014.
• A regular contributor to Everyday Ayurveda, The The Atlanta Jewish Times, Ayurveda Mantra magazine, Sivana East, and Medium.com.  See Press page for all Media.

Education & Training

• Ph.D. in Traditional Naturopathy
• Graduated Honors with B.S. in Natural Health and Doctor of Naturopathy from Clayton College of Natural Health, 2004.
• Completed a four-year training program with world-renowned energy healer, teacher, and writer, Dr. Michael Mamas. Studies included 600 hours of hands-on healing and mind/body relationship exploration. www.mountsoma.org. 2000
• Completed Marma Therapy training with Vasant Lad, Ayurveda physician and founder of the Ayurvedic Institute, Albuquerque, New Mexico. 2011
• Received an Ayurveda Certificate upon completion of training with Vasant Lad in a clinical setting in Pune, India. 2012
• Reiki Master Certification, 1995
• Student of Siddha Yoga Meditation since 1990.

Artist Bio

As I began meditating in 1990  I was naturally drawn to studying and experiencing the healing arts. Painting and using color became a natural expression of what I was feeling inside. I also copied in pastel from famous artists like Wolf Kahn to further understand painting.

I realized then that for the many issues I was dealing with in my body, the painting and color had transformed my experience of myself and the world around me. It was this realization and the practice of art that healed my body and heart. This outpouring of energy in the form of creativity continues to be a part of my daily life.

I share these paintings with you with the intention of inspiring the creator within you.

Contact Gedalia by email

or by phone 678-357-3443
